field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @year)⩓not exists(select 1 from cttt20 b where @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct and @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and b.ma_ct = @voucherID) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from cttt20 b where @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct and @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and b.ma_ct = @voucherID) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

field.name: ma_nvbh
field.check: ma_nvbh <> '' and ma_nvbh not in (select ma_nvbh from dmnvbh)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where tk_cn = 1 and loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_nt

field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = '' then 0 else b.t_tt_nt end

field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = '' then b.t_tt_nt else round(b.t_tt_nt * b.ty_gia, @round) end

field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = '' then b.t_tt_nt else round(b.t_tt_nt * b.ty_gia, @round) end

field.updateValue: case when b.ma_nt = '' then 0 else b.t_tt_qd0 end

text.v: Cập nhật số dư đầu kỳ của các hóa đơn

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @fields nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @user int, @admin bit, @m int, @year int, @r int, @i int, @count int, @baseCurrency varchar(10), @round int
select @i = 1, @voucherID = 'HD0', @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @year = nam_bd from dmstt select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ma_nt0' select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @round = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'wrkcolumns' and column_name = 'so_ct'
update @@table set so_ct = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_ct))) + ltrim(so_ct), ma_nt = case when a.ma_nt <> '' then a.ma_nt else @baseCurrency end, tk = case when a.tk <> '' then a.tk else b.tk end, ma_tt = case when a.ma_tt <> '' then a.ma_tt else b.ma_tt end from @@table a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh
if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'ARInvoiceOpeningBalance', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
-- Checking &Checking;
select @count = count(*) from @@table if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from cttt20 b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and b.ma_ct = @voucherID)
update @@table set stt_rec = b.stt_rec from @@table a join (select c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_ct, c.so_ct, min(c.stt_rec) as stt_rec from cttt20 c join @@table d on c.ma_dvcs = d.ma_dvcs and c.ngay_ct = d.ngay_ct and c.so_ct = d.so_ct where c.ma_ct = @voucherID group by c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_ct, c.so_ct) b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct
select * into #k from @@table where stt_rec <> ''
if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_dvcs', a.stt, '00001' from #k a join cttt20 b on left(a.stt_rec, 10) = left(b.stt_rec_tt, 10) and b.loai_tt = 1 &w1;'ma_dvcs'&w2;a.stt&w3;'00001'&w4; group by a.stt &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_dvcs', @r = min(a.stt) from #k a join cttt20 b on left(a.stt_rec, 10) = left(b.stt_rec_tt, 10) and b.loai_tt = 1&Error; end &EndErrorMode;
delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct)
-- Insert if @count > 0 begin exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @user, '@@table', 'stt_rec', 'stt' update @@table set ma_nt = '', ty_gia = 0 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency &Inserting; end
-- Update if @type = 1 begin update #k set ma_nt = '', ty_gia = 0 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency update cttt20 set @@list from cttt20 a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end
